name: di-ipv-cri-address-front
description: User interface for the Identity Proofing and Verification (IPV) system within the GDS digital identity platform, GOV.UK Sign In.

scripts.start:ci: yarn build && NODE_ENV=development API_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8010/ DEVICE_INTELLIGENCE_ENABLED=true DEVICE_INTELLIGENCE_DOMAIN=localhost yarn start
scripts.build: yarn build-sass && yarn build-js && yarn copy-assets && yarn copy-js
scripts.build-sass: rm -rf dist/public/stylesheets/application.css && sass --no-source-map src/assets/scss/application.scss dist/public/stylesheets/application.css --style compressed
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.njk dist/ src/locales/**/** dist/ && copyfiles -u 3 src/assets/javascript/*.js dist/public/scripts && copyfiles -u 3 src/assets/images/** dist/public/images
scripts.build-js: yarn build-js:analytics && yarn build-js:device-intelligence && yarn build-js:all
scripts.build-js:all: mkdir -p dist/public/javascripts; uglifyjs node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/all.js node_modules/hmpo-components/all.js --beautify -o dist/public/javascripts/all.js
scripts.minfiy-build-js: uglifyjs src/assets/javascript/application.js -o src/assets/javascript/application.js -c -m && uglifyjs src/assets/javascript/cookies.js -o src/assets/javascript/cookies.js -c -m
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:eslint -- --fix && npm run lint:prettier -- --write
scripts.test:browser: wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:8010 tcp:127.0.0.1:5010 && API_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8010 MOCK_API=true cucumber-js --config test/browser/cucumber.js --tags "not @skip"
scripts.test:browser:only: wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:8010 tcp:127.0.0.1:5010 && API_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8010 MOCK_API=true cucumber-js --config test/browser/cucumber.js --tags "@only and not @skip"
